headline: Deutsche Bank Seeks Loan Participants for Blackstone’s Bid for Maldives Seaplane Operator TMA
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Deutsche Bank AG is gauging interest from potential participants in a $200 million loan to support Blackstone Inc.’s bid for seaplane operator Trans Maldivian Airways Pvt, people familiar with the matter said.Most Read from BloombergThey Built a Secret Apartment in a Mall. headline: Hillhouse hires Japan co-heads for real estate investment arm from Blackstone, source says
summary: TOKYO -Hillhouse Investment has hired co-heads for its Japan real estate investment business, a source familiar with the matter said, as it bulks up its operations there. Hillhouse has...
